commit.message:
char_traits.h: Update copyright, tweak.


2003-07-25  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@redhat.com>

	* include/bits/char_traits.h: Update copyright, tweak.
	* testsuite/ext/pod_char_traits.cc: Explicitly qualifiy namespace
	std types.
